items.title: ‘Champagne bottles had stopped popping.’ Why OPEC+ is making a move to ease an expected global oil glut.
items.description: Major oil producers have little reason to celebrate with crude prices down by more than 10% so far this year and market forecasts for the biggest glob...

items.title: Here’s why Beyond Meat investors aren’t happy that earnings were delayed
items.description: The meme stock said that it needs more time to quantify a previously disclosed impairment charge.

items.title: Sports bettors keep winning. Here’s how much that could hit profits at DraftKings and FanDuel.
items.description: Through week 9 of the current NFL season, favorites are covering the spread at a high rate (56.1%) compared to just 43.9% for underdogs.

items.title: Here’s how much Ford’s EV sales dropped as tax credits expired
items.description: Hyundai and Kia also posted October sales drops for certain EV models, after demand swelled in September.

items.title: Palantir’s stock rises as AI fuels another flurry of records
items.description: The software company is boosting its outlook, and its CEO is cheering gains for retail investors.
